name: df-lo1
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(clo1, crab(s0, co(cr, cpm, cr), wrex(s1, cr, wrex(s2, cr, wral(s3, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cle, cv(s2)))))))
comment: Define the set of eventually upper bounded real functions. This fills a gap in ` O(1) ` coverage, to express statements like ` f ( x ) <_ g ( x ) + O ( x ) ` via ` ( x e. RR+ |-> ( f ( x ) - g ( x ) ) / x ) e. <_O(1) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2016.)
